name: Cranston AI
long_description:
Cranston is a full service accounting firm. We handle bookkeeping, corporate taxes, and financial automations for SMB and mid market companies with AI software and a CPA team. We pull in context from all your company's apps & data, connect to existing systems of record and handle repetitive finance work.

We provide an intelligence layer on top of systems like QuickBooks, NetSuite, SAP, or custom ERPs to ingest and categorize transactions, post entries, route approvals, and surface only items that need a decision.

We automate bookkeeping with daily reconciliations, accruals, and a month end close reviewed by CPAs. We also handle Taxes end to end, from quarterly estimates to year end corporate returns, prepared from the same ledger and filed on schedule.
one_liner: Full-service AI for accounting and finance
